sourcesContent:
<template>
   <v-menu offset-y open-on-hover>
      <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
        <v-btn
          v-bind="attrs"
          v-on="on"
        >
          <v-btn icon><v-icon>mdi-menu</v-icon></v-btn>
        </v-btn>
      </template>
      <v-list>
        <v-list-item
          v-for="(item, index) in items"
          :key="index"
        >
          <v-list-item-content @click="screenChange()">
              <v-list-item-title v-text="item.title" @click="screenChange()"></v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list>
    </v-menu>
</template>

<script>


export default {
    name : 'MenuBar',
    data () {
        return {
            items: [
                { title: 'Travel작성' },
                { title: '랭킹' },
                { title: 'MyPage' },
                
            ]
        }
    } ,
    methods: {
        screenChange(){
            console.log("click")
        }
    },
}
</script>


<style scoped>

</style>
